title: Knockback Axes
description_short: Add the knockback enchantment to axes
description: Grants the ability to add knockback enchanted books to axes

features.label: Knockback enchantment can be applied to any axe by holding an enchanted book in the players offhand and an axe in the mainhand.</br>Then, interact with an anvil to apply the enchantment if you have sufficent XP levels
